topic.title: 单线程cpu占满, 其他线程cpu几乎为0
topic.body:
### Step 1: Please describe your environment

  * ZeroNet version: __0.6.2(rev3417)___
  * Operating system: __ubuntu16.04___
  * Web browser: __chrome___
  * Tor status: disabled
  * Opened port: yes
  * Special configuration: ____

### Step 2: Describe the problem:

#### Steps to reproduce:

  1. __打开zeroup___
  2. __勾选"下载并帮助分发所有文件"___
  3. __之后刷新zeroup页面___

#### Observed Results:

刷新zeropup页面后会卡住很久才加载出页面, 期间单个线程CPU占满。
```htop info
 1127 xxxx        20   0 2080M 1051M  6628 R 100.  6.6 12h13:28 ../Python/python2.7 zeronet.py --ui_ip * --ui_host zeronet.xxxx.com:80
 3113 xxxx        20   0 2080M 1051M  6628 S  0.0  6.6  0:19.80 ../Python/python2.7 zeronet.py --ui_ip * --ui_host zeronet.xxxx.com:80 
 7256 xxxx        20   0 2080M 1051M  6628 S  0.0  6.6  0:10.18 ../Python/python2.7 zeronet.py --ui_ip * --ui_host zeronet.xxxx.com:80 
 3115 xxxx        20   0 2080M 1051M  6628 S  0.0  6.6  0:19.59 ../Python/python2.7 zeronet.py --ui_ip * --ui_host zeronet.xxxx.com:80 
 1665 xxxx        20   0 2080M 1051M  6628 S  0.0  6.6  0:19.95 ../Python/python2.7 zeronet.py --ui_ip * --ui_host zeronet.xxxx.com:80 
 1121 xxxx        20   0 19584  2116  2116 S  0.0  0.0  0:00.00 /bin/bash ../Python/python zeronet.py --ui_ip * --ui_host zeronet.xxxx.com:80
 3114 xxxx        20   0 2080M 1051M  6628 S  0.0  6.6  0:19.49 ../Python/python2.7 zeronet.py --ui_ip * --ui_host zeronet.xxxx.com:80 
 3116 xxxx        20   0 2080M 1051M  6628 S  0.0  6.6  0:19.43 ../Python/python2.7 zeronet.py --ui_ip * --ui_host zeronet.xxxx.com:80 
 3117 xxxx        20   0 2080M 1051M  6628 S  0.0  6.6  0:19.43 ../Python/python2.7 zeronet.py --ui_ip * --ui_host zeronet.xxxx.com:80 
 3155 xxxx        20   0 2080M 1051M  6628 S  0.0  6.6  0:19.88 ../Python/python2.7 zeronet.py --ui_ip * --ui_host zeronet.xxxx.com:80 
 7257 xxxx        20   0 2080M 1051M  6628 S  0.0  6.6  0:10.21 ../Python/python2.7 zeronet.py --ui_ip * --ui_host zeronet.xxxx.com:80 
 7258 xxxx        20   0 2080M 1051M  6628 S  0.0  6.6  0:10.17 ../Python/python2.7 zeronet.py --ui_ip * --ui_host zeronet.xxxx.com:80 
```

#### Expected Results:
能够正常的打开页面。
